name: Birdman's Island
description: Birdman's Island is a Tamagotchi-style pet simulator created by Onionsandpeas and FritzyP for the Godot Wild Jam # 15. The game was created in from November 9 to 17, 2019, including all visual and audio assets. The game creation engine was Godot 3.1.1. Gameplay features six different pets and an evolution tree between them. Typical game duration is between five and ten minutes. Because game duration is short, the pet requires substantially more attention than traditional pet simulators.
